Items

Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • Items.Item
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    NullItem, Potion, Weapon

    public class Item
extends java.lang.Object
    Item class! allows items to be a thing. Has 4 fields: Name, Count, Rarity, and Value.
